Primary.synopsis: WYR South checkpoint primary guard dialog. A watcher checks if you have been in conflict with a scrying eye, and attacks if warranted.
Primary.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?name=New%20Bookmark&mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=4.163053;50.366581;2.494043&camTarget=4.179307;50.032921;3.436596Walk towards the bridge gates

AD_CommandsAfterSunflash.synopsis: After gnomes throw a sunflash at Steel Watcher at WYR south checkpoint and run away, Manip Edwynna starts commanding and shouting at Flaming Fists.
AD_CommandsAfterSunflash.how_to_trigger: Manip Edwynna - S_WYR_South_Guard_004 e572c6d1-3330-46fd-9ecc-da318f499956 - (2 38)Initiate checkpoint and convince your way into the city. Afterwards, the gnomes throw their grenade and run off. This AD is spoken.

AD_Refugees.synopsis: Guards and refugees chit-chat at WYR south checkpoint.

Guard_003.synopsis: A guard having conversation with refugees at WYR south checkpoint.

Civilian_001.synopsis: Refugee at entrance to WYR south checkpoint. Trying to get in, but having issues with guards checking documents.

AD_GoldGiver_Calling.synopsis: If player passes peacefully through WYR South checkpoint, one guard offers "to earn some money" (quest about gnome's head.

SteelWatch_Trespass.synopsis: A trespass dialog for Steel Watcher at WYR South checkpoint.
SteelWatch_Trespass.how_to_trigger: Go tolarian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=4.746866;51.832020;14.251555&camTarget=4.618553;51.433636;15.159755Kill all FF guards with Ctrl+Shift+K, walk through the checkpoint (through the gates).

Civilian_000.synopsis: Refugee at entrance to WYR south checkpoint. Trying to get in, but having issues with guards checking documents.

Guard_002.synopsis: A guard having conversation with refugees at WYR south checkpoint.

GoldQuestGiver.synopsis: Flaming Fist guard at WYR South checkpoint that gives a quest to kill Ironhand gnomes

Guard_005.synopsis: Guard dialog at observation deck of WYR south checkpoint gates. Off-limits for players at any time.

WarningGuard.synopsis: WYR south "checkpoint warning" guard: tells player to first get legit access before proceeding any further.

Guard_009.synopsis: Guard dialog at South checkpoint. Guard at the outer checkpoint border.

AD_GuardsAfterPanic.synopsis: After Steel Watcher is sunflashed by gnomes at WYR South checkpoint, guards are in panic. But then recognition soaks in and they turn to player who was an enemy just moments before that.

SteelWatch.synopsis: Steel Watcher at WYR South checkpoint dialog
SteelWatch.how_to_trigger: Go tolarian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=3.229594;52.549690;10.047598&camTarget=3.228639;52.118618;10.949918Kill all FFs with Ctrl+Shift+K. Click on the SW to talk.Alternatively, give your character some gold and BALDURIAN tag. Walk through checkpoint by paying gold and saying that you're Baldurian. Then after access allowed, talk to Steel Watcher.

Civilian_005.synopsis: A small boy with parents at WYR south checkpoint. Not being let in.

GoldGuard_00.synopsis: One liner for a guard at WYR South checkpoint inside the tower

VB_AfterSentToPrison.synopsis: VB in prison after being sent here from WYR South checkpoint
VB_AfterSentToPrison.how_to_trigger: Come to WYR South checkpoint at larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=5.288334;46.046982;5.899705&camTarget=5.155804;45.673344;6.817763Use Debug book -> Set quest flags and options -> Act3 -> WYR South checkpoint -> Set flags scrying eyes seen crimes.Also set BALDURIAN tag there.Walk through checkpoint, tell your name, tell you're baldurian, agree to scan.After scan agree to custody.VB happens after teleport to prison

GoldGuard_01.synopsis: One liner for a guard at WYR South checkpoint inside the tower

Civilian_004.synopsis: A small boy with parents at WYR south checkpoint. Not being let in.

AD_GoldGuards.synopsis: Behaviour AD between 2 guards of a gold chest at WYR South checkpoint.
AD_GoldGuards.how_to_trigger: Walk to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-5.800818;47.730431;54.453289&camTarget=-6.342497;47.173607;53.823582and wait for guards to talk

Civilian_003.synopsis: Refugee at entrance to WYR south checkpoint. Waiting for there turn in queue.

AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash.synopsis: After Steel Watcher was sunflashed at WYR South checkpoint, one guard announces a reward for gnomes' leader head.

Guard_001.synopsis: WYR south "checkpoint warning" guard: tells player to first get legit access before proceeding any further.

Civilian_002.synopsis: Refugee at entrance to WYR south checkpoint. Waiting for there turn in queue.

AD_GnomesNoticed.synopsis: Steel Watcher AD noticing gnomes at south checkpoint at WYR. Used in case if player skips the checkpoint and sneaks behind it.
AD_GnomesNoticed.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main_A, come to larian://bookmark?name=BGO_WyrmCrossing_StartCrossingBridge&mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=3.670112;76.643791;28.564262&camTarget=3.623620;76.210350;29.464245but don't go near guards, instead T your character further behind the checkpoint.

Primary_55.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_55.text: Stand ready for examination. This won't take a moment.

Primary_107.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_107.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has gotten through the checkpoint already

Primary_139.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_139.text: Halt! By orders of Lord Gortash, refugees are no longer allowed in the city. Turn around.
Primary_139.context: InternalNodeContext: Checkpoint main dialog. Player hasn't yet gotten admission.

Primary_26.speaker: Player
Primary_26.text: I can take care of myself. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

Primary_36.speaker: Player
Primary_36.text: I am Wyll Ravengard. I trust you will let me through?

Primary_162.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_162.text: Ravengard? More like the ghastliest tiefling south of Neverwinter.

Primary_63.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_63.text: Ravengard? Yes, of course - pardon the trouble. A cult army's on the move and we know for a fact there are spies among the exiles.

Primary_12.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_12.text: Now - please open your eyes, keep your body still. This will take but a moment.
Primary_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Steel Watcher walks a little bit forward from under the gate arches.

Primary_122.speaker: Player
Primary_122.text: I've lived in this cess-pit longer than you've been alive. We can compare stinks, if you would like?

Primary_137.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_137.text: Well, do you have the means to support yourself? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

Primary_114.speaker: Wyll
Primary_114.text: My good lady. I am Wyll Ravengard. I will not pay to enter my own city.

Primary_14.speaker: Player
Primary_14.text: I can take care of myself. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

Primary_106.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_106.text: Right. Article 30.1.5 of the Council's Decree on Extraordinary Wartime Measures. I am confiscating that. The city thanks you for your contribution.
Primary_106.context: InternalNodeContext: Gold is still in player's inventory

Primary_92.speaker: Player
Primary_92.text: Why do you need my name?

Primary_133.speaker: Narrator
Primary_133.text: *Your parasite stirs. From the construct, you feel connection. Resonance.*
Primary_133.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player squints as they feel their tadpole stir.

Primary_51.speaker: Player
Primary_51.text: What in the hells is that thing?

Primary_91.text: I am a Steel Watcher, citizen. Here to serve the people of Baldur's Gate in the name of Lord Enver Gortash.

Primary_118.speaker: Wyll
Primary_118.text: My good lady. I am Wyll Ravengard. My business is the city's business.

Primary_130.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_130.text: Ravengard? More like the ghastliest tiefling south of Neverwinter.

Primary_39.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_39.text: I'm in no mood for jests. Business?

Primary_127.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_127.text: The Duke's son? Of course - excuse the trouble. No room for exiles, no mercy for spies. Lord Gortash's orders.

Primary_75.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_75.text: Wyll Ravengard? Of course, of course - the city is always open to you. But I'm afraid you'll still need to comply with new protocol. By Lord Gortash's command.

Primary_132.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_132.text: Please open your eyes, keep your body still. This will take but a moment.
Primary_132.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to player. Steel Watcher walks a little bit forward from under the gate arches.

Primary_78.speaker: Player
Primary_78.text: What makes my business your business?

Primary_140.speaker: Player
Primary_140.text: I have an urgent message for Duke Ulder Ravengard.

Primary_42.speaker: Player
Primary_42.text: I was born and raised in Baldur's Gate. This is my home.

Primary_165.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_165.context: CinematicNodeContext: Steel Watcher walks a little bit forward from under the gate arches.NodeContext: "Uh-huh" as in, "Yes, I heard you and am going with it."

Primary_152.speaker: Player
Primary_152.text: Do as she says. Stand still.

Primary_22.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The steel watcher steps forward and begins to scan the player's eyes.
There is NO mindmeld, because player is NOT tadpoled.

Primary_68.speaker: Narrator
Primary_68.text: *Behind the Watcher's gaze, a presence awakens. You may not carry a mind flayer parasite, but it sees you - knows you.*

Primary_145.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The steel watcher steps forward and begins to scan the player's eyes.
There is NO mindmeld, because player is NOT tadpoled. ? 

context copied over by jack O'Flynn

Primary_161.speaker: Narrator
Primary_161.text: *Behind the Watcher's gaze, a presence awakens. You are seen, you are known.*

Primary_95.speaker: Narrator
Primary_95.text: *Your infernal machinery seems to snap to attention, almost singing in recognition.*

Primary_150.speaker: Karlach
Primary_150.text: Whoa. My engine. It's almost... I don't know. Buzzing. Like it's paying attention.

Primary_73.speaker: Narrator
Primary_73.text: *Your party's prior transgressions are reflected in its stare, as witnessed by the cult's ever-alert scrying eyes.*

Primary_47.speaker: Narrator
Primary_47.text: *It has heard the howls of slaughtered goblins.*

Primary_143.speaker: Narrator
Primary_143.text: *It has seen the deep shadows of Grymforge, and the stone floors left bloodied.*

Primary_16.speaker: Narrator
Primary_16.text: *It knows the cold walls of Moonrise Towers, and the cultists who fell there.*

Primary_134.speaker: Narrator
Primary_134.text: *The Watcher speaks directly into your mind with a voice like poisoned honey.*

Primary_96.speaker: Narrator
Primary_96.text: You are marked for special treatment. Not simply an enemy of the people, but an enemy of the Absolute. Come quietly, or die.

Primary_141.speaker: Narrator
Primary_141.text: You are marked for special treatment. A defective Steel Watcher. Not simply an enemy of the people, but an enemy of the Absolute. Come quietly, or die.

Primary_4.text: You are marked for special treatment. Not simply an enemy of the people, but an enemy of the Absolute. Come quietly, or die.

Primary_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld with steel watcher ends

Primary_113.speaker: Player
Primary_113.text: Why do you call me a Steel Watcher? I'm not one of you.

Primary_46.speaker: Narrator
Primary_46.text: *There is a moment's pause. The presence reevaluates you.*

Primary_7.text: Apologies, citizen. No offence intended. Welcome to Baldur's Gate. I hope you have a nice day.
Primary_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Steel Watcher walks back to the gate

Primary_19.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_19.text: The Watch has spoken. You may pass.

Primary_31.text: Your peaceful surrender has been noted. You will be transferred to Wyrm's Rock Prison where you will await further sentencing.

Primary_10.text: Please comply now, citizen. I will interpret any further hesitation as resistance.

Primary_11.text: Eat this, you pile of junk!

Primary_58.speaker: Narrator
Primary_58.text: *You have felt this presence before, in the unblinking void of a scrying eye.*

Primary_116.speaker: Narrator
Primary_116.text: *The scrying eyes have borne witness to your actions - and they reveal no violations.*

Primary_144.text: Your record is clean, citizen Fluffington. Keep it that way and enjoy your visit to Baldur's Gate.
Primary_144.context: CinematicNodeContext: Steel Watcher walks back to the gate

Primary_158.text: Your record is clean, citizen. Keep it that way and enjoy your visit to Baldur's Gate.
Primary_158.context: CinematicNodeContext: Steel Watcher walks back to the gate

Primary_84.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_84.text: The Watcher will communicate with our new intelligence directorate. They'll determine if you're a threat to the city.

Primary_99.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_99.text: Upstanding citizens have no reason to fear. And you are an upstanding citizen, aren't you?

Primary_35.speaker: Player
Primary_35.text: On second thought, I'll come back later.

Primary_45.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_45.text: Shifty eyes expose lies. Entry refused.

Primary_121.speaker: Player
Primary_121.text: I need to pass. I was born and raised in Baldur's Gate. This is my home.

Primary_131.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_131.text: Then you can wait with the rest.

Primary_111.speaker: Player
Primary_111.text: Baldur's Gate is my city, my home.

Primary_163.speaker: Player
Primary_163.text: Please, let me pass. Baldur's Gate is my city, my home.

Primary_32.speaker: Player
Primary_32.text: I'm here to enlist - figured the Fist could use a hand.

Primary_98.speaker: Player
Primary_98.text: I'm just here to purchase an eldritch tome of immense magical power.

Primary_101.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_101.text: Sure, and I'm the Marshal of the Flaming Fist. Lying gets you nowhere - entry refused.

Primary_128.speaker: Player
Primary_128.text: Never mind. I'll be on my way.

Primary_146.speaker: Jaheira
Primary_146.text: I'm a herbalist by trade, Saer Fist. My assistants and I were out collecting blooms for that rub-rot going around. Nasty business. Contagious.
Primary_146.context: NodeContext: Change in demeanour to polite, unassuming older woman - a guard is challenging her to enter the city and she's trying to fob them off without giving any real details. 'Saer Fist' is a polite form of address to flaming fist.

Primary_138.speaker: Player
Primary_138.text: You are scamming me. Give me my money back.

Primary_85.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_85.text: Take it up with the Duke if you don't like it. Now, your name?

Primary_24.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_24.text: What's this? Off with you. Only the self-sufficient may enter.
Primary_24.context: InternalNodeContext: Player hid gold before choosing this option

Primary_70.speaker: Player
Primary_70.text: I'm here on pilgrimage - the temples will support me.

Primary_123.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_123.text: I'm afraid Article 30.1.7 stipulates that religious or spiritual assertions cannot count towards one's proof of self-sufficiency.

Primary_164.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_164.text: I will repeat - for the last time, may I add - do you have means to support yourself? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

Primary_81.speaker: Player
Primary_81.text: Oh, I have help from the other side if I ever need support.

Primary_48.speaker: Player
Primary_48.text: I don't need any money to support myself. I live off what I find in nature.

Primary_74.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_74.text: Then you don't need to be in the city. Next!

Primary_17.speaker: Player
Primary_17.text: I'm out of money but I'll get some soon.

Primary_71.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_71.text: Sure. Now turn around and stop wasting my time. Next!

Primary_142.speaker: Player
Primary_142.text: I have urgent business in the city.

Primary_41.speaker: Player
Primary_41.text: You have no idea who you are talking to. Let me through or I'll kill you.

Primary_52.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
Primary_52.text: Really? Here I thought this was going to be a boring day.

AD_CommandsAfterSunflash_0.speaker: Gauntlet Edwynna
AD_CommandsAfterSunflash_0.text: Gods damn it all! Find those little bastards, or I'll have your heads!
AD_CommandsAfterSunflash_0.context: NodeContext: calling out to nearby Flaming Fist allies - the 'little bastards' are gnomes who attacked the checkpoint this Fist is guarding

AD_Refugees_1.speaker: Horus Crysst
AD_Refugees_1.text: Please. My son - he's only a boy. You must understand -

AD_Refugees_4.speaker: Fist Silena
AD_Refugees_4.text: Sir. Sir. We can't let you in.

AD_Refugees_0.speaker: Horus Crysst
AD_Refugees_0.text: I - I thought we'd be safe in the Gate. I heard the stories.

AD_Refugees_2.speaker: Fist Kepso
AD_Refugees_2.text: Wail all you want - we've got enough mouths to feed. We don't need your kind.

AD_Refugees_11.speaker: Fist Silena
AD_Refugees_11.text: Enough, Kepso. Sir, you need to stay clear.

AD_Refugees_9.speaker: Fist Kepso
AD_Refugees_9.text: Citizens only. I won't say it again.

AD_Refugees_3.speaker: Horus Crysst
AD_Refugees_3.text: But - but we walked clear from Amn. There's nowhere else to go. Please -

AD_Refugees_10.speaker: Fist Silena
AD_Refugees_10.text: Orders are orders. We've got ours, you've got yours. I need you to step back.

AD_Refugees_5.speaker: Fist Silena
AD_Refugees_5.context: NodeContext: Unfeeling, following orders. Irritated at having to repeat themselves.

AD_Refugees_14.speaker: Noira Crysst
AD_Refugees_14.text: The Duke - Ravengard, I think. I heard he's a good man.

AD_Refugees_6.speaker: Horus Crysst
AD_Refugees_6.text: Let us talk to him. Please. If he could just -

AD_Refugees_8.speaker: Fist Kepso
AD_Refugees_8.text: We have the Duke's full support. For the good of the people. Our people.

Civilian_001_0.speaker: Noira Crysst
Civilian_001_0.text: I don't know what to do. There's nowhere else to go.

Civilian_001_1.speaker: Noira Crysst
Civilian_001_1.text: We can't get in. I - I have family here. They said we'd be welcome.

AD_GoldGiver_Calling_0.speaker: Manip Falcäo
AD_GoldGiver_Calling_0.text: Got a moment? I've got work for someone like you.

AD_GoldGiver_Calling_1.speaker: Manip Falcäo
AD_GoldGiver_Calling_1.text: You there. Looking to earn some coin?

AD_GoldGiver_Calling_3.speaker: Manip Falcäo
AD_GoldGiver_Calling_3.text: Listen up, folks - I got a job needs doing.

SteelWatch_Trespass_1.text: Unauthorised access to the city is a serious offence. Surrender for sentencing, villain.

SteelWatch_Trespass_6.speaker: Player
SteelWatch_Trespass_6.text: Call on your parasite. Force the watcher to stand down.

SteelWatch_Trespass_7.text: An innocent mistake. Please return to the checkpoint to receive proper authorisation.

SteelWatch_Trespass_3.text: By the edicts of Lord Gortash, you are sentenced to death. Please comply.

Civilian_000_0.speaker: Horus Crysst
Civilian_000_0.text: Heartless bastards. If they'd just listen.

Civilian_000_1.speaker: Horus Crysst
Civilian_000_1.text: That duke - Ravengard. He'll let us in. He has to!

Guard_002_1.speaker: Fist Kepso
Guard_002_1.text: Take it somewhere else. My hands are full.

GoldQuestGiver_1.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_1.text: Bloody gnomes. Think they can get away with anything.
GoldQuestGiver_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Player went through checkpoint, no gnomes. Guard still gives quest to kill gnomes

GoldQuestGiver_39.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_39.text: Kneelickers threw explosives at the Steel Watch.

GoldQuestGiver_5.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_5.text: You want through? Talk to Edwynna.
GoldQuestGiver_5.context: InternalNodeContext: If player hasn't yet gotten approval through checkpoint, this guard won't give the quest.

GoldQuestGiver_9.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_9.context: InternalNodeContext: The guard gives a "quest" to find the gnomes. But in fact it's just a way to involve player into gnomes' story. At the end of the day, the guard will say that they're too busy to bother about any refugees.

GoldQuestGiver_24.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_24.text: We need to find where they burrowed themselves up.

GoldQuestGiver_0.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_0.text: You! You an adventurer? Looking to pad your purse? Find their foxhole, bring me their chief's head. The Fist will reward you well.

GoldQuestGiver_25.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_25.text: You don't got a problem with that, do you? Those blasted thugs are a stain on your kind.

GoldQuestGiver_26.speaker: Player
GoldQuestGiver_26.text: Bring you their head? That sounds radical.

GoldQuestGiver_3.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_3.text: You'll change your mind once they kill innocent citizens. The only language they'll understand is that of intimidating violence.

GoldQuestGiver_19.speaker: Player
GoldQuestGiver_19.text: This sounds like a job for the Flaming Fist.

GoldQuestGiver_33.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_33.text: I agree. But we can't leave our posts, not with all the refugees swarming Wyrm's Crossing.

GoldQuestGiver_10.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_10.text: I agree. But we can't leave our posts, not with all the patriars meeting in Wyrm's Rock for the coronation.

GoldQuestGiver_12.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_12.text: You've the right look. Solid bones. Steady face. The kind that cleans up vermin for pay.

GoldQuestGiver_27.speaker: Player
GoldQuestGiver_27.text: I'll take the job. I'll find their hideout and bring the leader's head.

GoldQuestGiver_40.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_40.text: Good. Sniff them out, gut them clean. Keep Baldur's Gate safe.

GoldQuestGiver_34.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_34.text: Bring the head back here when it's done. I'll be around.

GoldQuestGiver_35.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_35.text: Then you're no friend of the Fist.

GoldQuestGiver_32.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_32.text: No matter - I'll find someone else. Most folks around here'll do almost anything, you pay them enough.

GoldQuestGiver_2.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_2.text: Damn - he's got the eyes of a rodent, and the smell to match. You did the Gate proud.

GoldQuestGiver_21.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_21.text: Almost forgot - here's your generous fee. Now keep your nose clean and your tongue still.
GoldQuestGiver_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Manip leans slightly forward (giving reward)

GoldQuestGiver_8.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_8.text: Almost forgot - here's your coins. Now keep your nose clean and your tongue still.

GoldQuestGiver_38.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_38.text: Would hate to see you meet the same fate.

GoldQuestGiver_7.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_7.text: Afraid your payday's been cancelled. Budget cuts and all that.

GoldQuestGiver_11.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_11.text: But something tells me you're not hurting for coin. A good, discreet killer's always in demand.

GoldQuestGiver_14.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_14.text: I see nothing but an empty hand. Enough games - bring me the gnome's head.

GoldQuestGiver_17.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_17.text: You got the gnome leader's head?

GoldQuestGiver_30.speaker: Player
GoldQuestGiver_30.text: I've changed my mind. I won't kill the gnomes.

GoldQuestGiver_15.speaker: Manip Falcäo
GoldQuestGiver_15.text: Then get back to it. It's only a matter of time before they do some real harm.

WarningGuard_0.speaker: Fist Richter
WarningGuard_0.text: Stay out of trouble. The Fist is watching.

WarningGuard_1.speaker: Fist Richter
WarningGuard_1.text: You keep your distance, and I'll keep mine.

WarningGuard_5.speaker: Fist Richter
WarningGuard_5.text: I can't let you pass. See the gauntlet.

Guard_009_0.speaker: Fist Wearne
Guard_009_0.text: I've got my eye on you. And them over there, too. I don't miss a thing.

AD_GuardsAfterPanic_0.speaker: Fist Kepso, Fist Silena, Gauntlet Edwynna
AD_GuardsAfterPanic_0.text: You there! You're not getting out of this mess!

SteelWatch_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Checkpoint main dialog. Player hasn't yet gotten admission.

SteelWatch_5.context: InternalNodeContext: Checkpoint main dialog. Player hasn't yet gotten admission.

SteelWatch_7.text: ENTRY IS AUTHORISED. MISCONDUCT WILL BE RECORDED.

SteelWatch_8.text: SUBJECT FLUFFINGTON IDENTIFIED. PROCEED AT WILL.

SteelWatch_9.text: Halt. You are engaged in unlawful entry. The Watch demands your arrest.

SteelWatch_1.text: A cell has been identified. Prepare for transfer.

SteelWatch_0.text: The Steel Watch does not tolerate resistance. You will be eliminated.

Civilian_005_0.speaker: Dannbo Indigo
Civilian_005_0.text: Pa said the Flaming Fist would be nice. But they don't seem nice.

VB_AfterSentToPrison_0.speaker: Player
VB_AfterSentToPrison_0.text: Trapped behind bars. I'd hoped for a warmer welcome to the Gate.

VB_AfterSentToPrison_1.speaker: Player
VB_AfterSentToPrison_1.text: Look for a way out. I'm not about to be contained by a few iron bars.

Civilian_004_0.speaker: Torin Crysst
Civilian_004_0.text: They won't let us in. And I asked real nice, too.

AD_GoldGuards_0.speaker: Fist Azari
AD_GoldGuards_0.text: Ravengard's back from Elturel, did you hear? Place fell clear down to the Hells.

AD_GoldGuards_1.speaker: Fist Azari
AD_GoldGuards_1.text: What I wouldn't give to grab a flagon with the duke. The man's a living legend.

AD_GoldGuards_4.speaker: Fist Azari
AD_GoldGuards_4.text: Two years of training, and I'm still stuck on guard duty. I need some action, Meadows. Boot on ground, blade on shield.

AD_GoldGuards_7.speaker: Fist Azari
AD_GoldGuards_7.text: 'I guarded chests from thieves' hardly makes for a good story.

AD_GoldGuards_3.speaker: Fist Azari
AD_GoldGuards_3.text: Thanks, old friend. Just what I needed to hear.

AD_GoldGuards_8.speaker: Fist Azari
AD_GoldGuards_8.text: You felt those quakes? Damn near shook me right out of my boots.

Civilian_003_0.speaker: Sammia Indigo
Civilian_003_0.text: So much for the famed hospitality of Baldur's Gate.

Civilian_003_1.speaker: Sammia Indigo
Civilian_003_1.text: I'm not going anywhere. Not 'til they let us through.

AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash_0.speaker: Manip Falcäo
AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash_0.text: Damned squatties, time they got what was coming. I'm looking for heads - who wants the bounty?

AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash_1.speaker: Manip Falcäo
AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash_1.text: Hey you. I've got a pest problem - and you look like the solution.

AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash_2.speaker: Manip Falcäo
AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash_2.text: You there. Need some coin? There's some vermin I need squashed.

AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash_3.speaker: Manip Falcäo
AD_GoldGiverAfterSunflash_3.text: Listen up! You need a spot of gold? I got the perfect job for you.

Guard_001_2.speaker: Fist Jepsen
Guard_001_2.text: Get back, already. Got a problem? Talk to the gauntlet.

Guard_001_3.speaker: Fist Jepsen
Guard_001_3.text: Get moving, unless you want a belly full of steel.

Guard_001_5.speaker: Fist Jepsen
Guard_001_5.text: No trespassing. You want access, see the gauntlet.

Civilian_002_0.speaker: Billigan Indigo
Civilian_002_0.text: Get in line. We were here first.

AD_GnomesNoticed_0.text: THREAT DETECTED. SPECIES: GNOME. EXTERMINATION AUTHORISED.
